title: Activity
custom_expected:
In the activity section, add a text field that says "enter a comment" 

An add button should display to the right of the comment field

The button should be disabled if the comment field is empty

Once the comment field is has text, activate the add button

The text field should resize up to four lines in height as the user is typing.

When clicking the add button do the following: 

Save the comment

Refresh the activity feed to display the comment (optional)

Display a green confirmation message to the user "Comment Added"
